{"category": "Administrative Questions", "subcategory": "Eligibility & Compliance", "question": "What are the documents required to be submitted before submission deadline? List all of them and indicate how to prepare these docs.", "answer": "Mentioned

The documents that must be submitted before the September 14 2020 deadline are the **Technical Proposal (TP)** and the **Financial Proposal (FP)**, each with a set of required forms, credentials, and administrative files.  They must be prepared in the formats and folders specified in the RFP.

**1. Technical Proposal (TP)**  
- **Forms & content**  
  - Comments on Scope of Work  
  - Confirmation of no conflict of interest  
  - Scope of work confirmation Letter (Form 2.1)  
  - Approach, methodology and work plan (Form 2.2)  
  - Work plan, organization and visits (Form 2.3)  
  - Curriculum Vitae for proposed staff (Form 2.3)  
  - Curriculum Vitae for proposed Project Manager (Form 2.4)  
  - Duly signed Letter by clients proving the PM’s role in a > 50 MW PV plant  
  - Applicant’s credentials (Form 2.5)  
  - Evidences and certificates signed by clients proving credentials  
  - Administrative file: trade/commercial register, statement of intent, power of attorney, joint‑and‑several liability declaration (if consortium), signed and initialed copy of the standard terms and conditions (Contract)  
  - Credentials demonstrating at least two grid‑connected PV plants with a total capacity of ≥ 100 MW (including one ≥ 50 MW plant) and a tender‑selected EPC for a PV plant > 5 MW.  
  – All TP documents must be **non‑compressed, non‑protected, printable and reproducible in Microsoft Word 2013** for the forms above.  
  – The TP must **not contain any financial information**; if it does, it is declared non‑responsive. [Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf, p:22](chunkref://35);[Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf, p:23](chunkref://36);[Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf, p:24](chunkref://37)

- **Preparation**  
  - Create each form in Word 2013, fill in the required information, and keep the files uncompressed and unprotected.  
  - Compile the administrative file and credentials into a single folder named “Technical folder” on the Masen e‑tendering platform.  
  - Ensure the folder contains no financial data.  

**2. Financial Proposal (FP)**  
- **Forms & content**  
  - Payment Milestones (Form 3.1)  
  - Financial Proposal submission form (Form 3.2)  
  - Financial Proposal Breakdown (Form 3.3)  
  - Commitment agreement (Form 3.4)  
  - Consortium commitment agreement (Form 3.5) – if the applicant is a consortium  
  - Separate lump‑sum quotation for each additional offer reviewed during the RFP process and for each supplemental firm/consortium negotiation.  
  – All FP documents must be **non‑compressed, non‑protected, printable and reproducible in Microsoft Word 2003** for the forms, **Microsoft Excel 2003** for tables, **JPEG** for all photos and images, and also supplied in a non‑protected PDF.  
  – The FP must be placed in the “Financial folder” on the Masen e‑tendering platform. [Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf, p:28](chunkref://44)

- **Preparation**  
  - Draft each form in Word 2003, tables in Excel 2003, and images in JPEG.  
  - Convert the entire FP to a non‑protected PDF for submission.  
  - Place the PDF and the individual Word/Excel/JPEG files in the “Financial folder.”  

**3. Submission logistics**  
- Both TP and FP must be submitted **no later than September 14 2020, 04:00 pm Moroccan time** via the Masen e‑tendering website (https://masen.local-trust.com/).  
- The Technical folder must not contain any financial information; otherwise the TP is declared non‑responsive.  
- The Financial folder contains the FP and the separate quotations.  
- The last FP submitted before the deadline is the only one considered if multiple are received.  
- All documents must be printable and reproducible in the specified formats; otherwise they will be rejected. [Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf, p:21](chunkref://32)

These are the complete set of documents and preparation requirements that must be met before the submission deadline.", "references": [{"chunk_id": 35, "file_name": "Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf", "page": 22, "bbox": [0.11174242424242424, 0.9325396825396826, 0.981060606060606, 0.9986772486772488], "snippet": "REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL — 5
Instructions to Applicants — 5.5
Content of the Proposals — 5.5.1
Content of the Technical Proposal — Applicants are required to submit a Technical Proposal (“TP”). The TP shall contain non-compressed and
non-protected files that are printable and reproducible in one of these formats: (a) Microsoft Word 2013 (for written documents and specifically for Forms 2.1, 2.2 and 2.3);", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [528.0, 756.0], "tender_id": "9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a6f6a"}, {"chunk_id": 36, "file_name": "Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf", "page": 23, "bbox": [0.11174242424242424, 0.2313937753721245, 0.981060606060606, 0.9837618403247632], "snippet": "REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL — 5
Instructions to Applicants — 5.5
Content of the Proposals — 5.5.1
Content of the Technical Proposal — A. Comments on the Scope of Work.
B. Confirmation of no conflict of interest and no inability to work with IFIs.
C. Scope of work confirmation Letter (Form 2.1)
D. Approach, methodology and work plan, for performing the assignment.
E. Work plan, organization and visits for performing the assignment (Form 2.2).
F. Curriculum Vitae (CV) for proposed staff (Form 2.3).
G. Curriculum Vitae (CV) for proposed Project Manager (Form 2.4).
H. Dully signed Letter by the clients to demonstrate the role of the Project Manager in the development of at least one PV plant of more than [50 MW].
I.
Applicant’s credentials (Form 2.5).
J.
Evidences and certificates dully signed by the clients to demonstrate the Applicant’s credentials.
K. Administrative file including the following documents in accordance with Appendix 4: i.
Trade/commercial register;
ii.
Duly signed statement of intent;
iii.
Duly signed power of attorney in favor of the Applicant' representative(s) authorized to legally
bind the Applicant with third parties;
iv.
If acting as a Consortium, a declaration of joint and several liability based on the model
agreement
v.
A signed and initialed copy (on all pages) of the standard terms and conditions (“Contract”).
The Contract must not include any price information. In case the original administrative files are different language that English, certified translation shall be provided
within the Technical Proposal. The TP shall provide the information indicated in the above paragraphs from (B) to (G) using forms (Forms
2.1, 2.2, 2.3 and 2.4). The TP shall include credentials demonstrating that the Applicant has at least: -
Prepared the feasibility study of at least two (2) grid connected PV plants with a minimum aggregate
installed capacity of [100 MW (comprising PV plants of more than 10 MW) including at least one 50
MW PV plant].
-
Selected a PV plant EPC through a tender including: -
Preparation of the tender technical documentation,
-
Evaluation of bids and selection of the preferred bidder, and
-
Negotiations of the contractual documentation. The projects presented as credentials by the Applicant shall have a higher capacity than [5 MW], if not
specified otherwise. Only plants with more than [5 MW] will be considered in the TP evaluation.", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [528.0, 739.0], "tender_id": "9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a6f6a"}, {"chunk_id": 37, "file_name": "Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf", "page": 24, "bbox": [0.11174242424242424, 0.09698558322411534, 0.9791666666666666, 0.1310615989515072], "snippet": "REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL — 5
Instructions to Applicants — 5.5
Content of the Proposals — 5.5.1
Content of the Technical Proposal — The TP shall not include any financial information. A TP containing financial information shall be
declared non-responsive.", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [528.0, 763.0], "tender_id": "9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a6f6a"}, {"chunk_id": 44, "file_name": "Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf", "page": 28, "bbox": [0.11174242424242424, 0.47368421052631576, 0.981060606060606, 0.9875346260387812], "snippet": "REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL — 5
Instructions to Applicants — 5.5
Content of the Proposals — 5.5.3
Content of the Financial Proposal — Applicants are required to submit a Financial Proposal which shall be prepared using the following forms: A. Payment Milestones (Form 3.1)
B. Financial Proposal submission form (Form 3.2)
C. Financial Proposal Breakdown (Form 3.3).
D. Commitment agreement (Form 3.4).
E. If acting as a Consortium, Consortium commitment agreement (Form 3.5). The Financial Proposal shall contain non-compressed and non-protected files that are printable and
reproducible in one of these formats: (a) Microsoft Word 2003 (for written documents and specifically for Forms 3.1, 3.2 and 3.3 (or 3.4
if acting as Consortium));
(b) Microsoft Excel 2003 (specifically for tables);
(c) JPEG format for the totality of the photos and images.

In addition, the Financial Proposal shall also be supplied in non-protected printable and reproducible PDF
format. All activities and items described in the RFPTA and Technical Proposal must be priced separately; activities
and items described in the Technical Proposal but not priced, shall be assumed to be included in the prices
of other activities or items. Each Applicant is also requested to provide a separate quotation (lump sum price) for each additional offer
reviewed during the RFP process, and for the negotiation to award the Contract with each supplemental
firm/consortium.", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [528.0, 722.0], "tender_id": "9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a6f6a"}, {"chunk_id": 32, "file_name": "Masen- KANONA ToR TA 20200608.pdf", "page": 21, "bbox": [0.11174242424242424, 0.2519480519480519, 0.981060606060606, 0.9831168831168832], "snippet": "REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL — 5
Instructions to Applicants — 5.2
Procedure and timing — The Technical Advisor may apply (i) individually or as part of a Consortium (ii) for Mission A and B. Applicants will obtain the Technical RFPTA in electronic format through the e-tendering solution of Masen
detailed below. Technical Proposals and Financial Proposals shall be submitted to the Client no later than [September
14th,2020, 04:00 pm Moroccan time] using e-tendering solution (see MASEN_Guide_Entreprise_Vf.pdf)
using the following website https://masen.local-trust.com/.

The Applicants shall submit the Technical proposal together with the administrative files under the
“Technical folder” and the Financial Proposals under the “Financial folder” in Masen e-tendering platform.
Applicants shall acknowledge that the Technical folder shall not include any financial information. Thus,
the relating Technical Proposal shall be declared non-responsive.

Technical Proposals shall be opened by the Client on [September 15th,2020, 04:00 pm Moroccan time] at
the earliest.

Financial Proposals shall be opened by Client on [October 16th, 2020] at the earliest. In case several Financial
Proposals were submitted by an Applicant, Client will only take into consideration the last one submitted
to Client, provided that such Proposal is submitted by no later than [September 14th,2020, 04:00 pm
Moroccan time].

Applicants may seek clarification from Client on the Technical RFPTA via the e-tendering solution.

In case of problem at the time of submission of proposals, the Applicants may call the following number:
00 33 1 76 64 74 02 or refer to the company guide.

Should Client deem it necessary to amend the Technical RFPTA as a result of a clarification, it shall do so
following the procedure described below.

At any time, before the submission of proposals and with no liability whatsoever, Client may amend the
Technical RFPTA by issuing an addendum by electronic means. The addendum shall be sent electronically to
all Applicants and shall be binding to them and considered an integral part of the original Technical RFPTA.

Applicants shall acknowledge receipt of all amendments. Not receiving the acknowledgement does not void
the amendment introduced by Client to the Technical RFPTA. To give Applicants reasonable time to take any
such amendment into account in their proposals Client may, at its discretion, if the amendment is
substantial, extend the deadline for the submission of proposals.", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [528.0, 770.0], "tender_id": "9f3f73a5-04ea-4b78-9db7-890b787a6f6a"}], "processing_time_sec": 20.384, "status": "success"}

project_card_fields.Project Scope:
Phase: Feasibility Study and RFP Preparation  
Scope: Mission A – Technical assistance in relation to development of PV Plant under EPC scheme, including Feasibility Study Due Diligence, Preparation of RFP documents and process management, and Selection of Preferred Bidder(s), awarding of contracts and negotiation of all Project Agreements.
project_card_fields.location: Africa, Zambia, Central Province, Serenje District, Kanona
project_card_fields.weighting: Yes, 70% for quality (Technical Proposal), 30% for price (Financial Proposal).
